parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current percentage of mass from items stored in a uniform relative to the maximum capacity of the uniform. <br>
It is equivalent to this formula:
<code>_loadUniform <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> massOfAllItemsInUniform / [[getContainerMaxLoad]] [[uniform]] [[player]]; </code>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''loadUniform''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_weight = [[loadUniform]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[load]], [[loadAbs]], [[loadBackpack]], [[loadVest]], [[getMass]], [[weightRTD]], [[getContainerMaxLoad]]
</value></part></template></root>
